## Task 1

Complete a message box for *any* issue aimed at *any* audience. This could be something related to your (intended) research, a hobby, a socio-political issue you're passionate about, etc. 


## Task 2

Complete a message box with the intention of targeting a granting agency (ie, the "audience") for funding to support *any* aspect of your graduate studies. If the specifics of your project are still uncertain, feel free to address another issue you find particularly interesting or important.


### Submitting your assignment

You have 2 options for submitting this assignment:

* print a message box, fill it out in pencil/ink, scan it or take a picture of it, and then email it to Mark

* write out each of the sections in a Word or Google doc, and then send the doc (or link) to Mark
